snippet.title: A Better SCP Experience | SCP: PANDEMIC | Content Focus Part 1
snippet.description:
A video explaining our efforts to make one of the best SCP experiences in gaming, from story narrative to active design elements.

PART 2: https://youtu.be/VtD0k_BtKmc
Check out SCP.GAMES: https://scp.games
Accredited SCP Wiki contributor list: https://affray.link/scp-credits
Get our game on Steam to support development (or wishlist): https://scp.games/pandemic

Follow our roadmap: https://affray.link/trello
Submit and upvote suggestions for development: https://feedback.pandemic.gg

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/affray
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/affraystudios
Level 5 Clearance on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/l5c

0:00 - Introduction
1:05 - Predacious SCP Entities
3:10 - Attribution
4:47 - SCP.GAMES
5:15 - Environmental SCP Entities
6:13 - Operation Moonfall
6:53 - Affray's SCP-7000 Proposal (SCP-7555)
7:55 - Outroduction

ORIGINAL VIDEO'S COMMENTS: https://affray.link/p1-comments

➡️ GIVEAWAY ANSWER: AFFRAY69GIVEAWAY

#SCPPandemic #SCP #SCPFoundation
